sentences.english: China has gone a long way to elevate its standing in the international soccer world.
sentences.chinese: 中国为提升在国际足坛的地位已经奋斗了很多年了。

sentences.english: Every year, they survey football business and its finances.
sentences.chinese: 每年，他们都会调研足坛的商业与经济状况。

sentences.english: He is a legend in Scotland and I hope to follow in his footsteps and have some success like he had here.
sentences.chinese: 他是苏格兰足坛的传奇而卧希望能追随他的脚步。

sentences.english: Some of Asia's wealthiest investors have linked up with the sport.
sentences.chinese: 一些亚洲最富有的投资者也涉足了英格兰足坛。

sentences.english: Or basically anything to do with the last 45 years of international football.
sentences.chinese: 基本上过去45年内国际足坛发生的事情都最好别提。

sentences.english: Where does Steven rank in world football in your opinion?
sentences.chinese: 在你看来，史蒂芬在世界足坛能排名第几？

definition: Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
